warns:
Danger!

This is just a test...
ltcl: * Fixed security issue - unauthorized users could inject pumpkins to your mods database.
changelog:
v0.0.2.6
* Fixed typo: Upadte -> Update
v0.0.2.7
+ You can now upload your custom modpack.jar
* Fixed issue from previous version: .jar extension were renamed to -jar
v0.0.2.8
* Fixed favicon
v0.0.2.9
* Fixed bug where modlist was wiped when changing the version of the java or memory
v0.0.2.10
* You don't need to have NAT Loopbback enabled
v0.0.2.11
* Optimized for web servers with multiple sites running at the same port.
v0.0.2.12
* You can now rename mods - Fixed bug
* Build updating now works correctly.
v0.0.2.13
+ Added Tawk.to Chat Box - You can get help right from your dashboard!
+ Added .htaccess file to functions folder - User won't be able to see function files
+ Added title to each site.
v0.0.2.14
+ Added .htaccess file to all folders - Unauthorized will not be able to view the files you have uploaded.
v0.0.2.15
* Changed some text on the dashboard.
+ Added Update Checker on the Dashboard.
v0.0.2.16
* Name is now displayed instead of Email
+ New resource - Banner
+ Added 403 Error page.
v0.0.2.17
* Fixed security issue - unauthorized users could inject mods to your mods database.
